strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Cozy RPG Patch Notes' metaphor aligns perfectly with the Gen-Z retro gaming aesthetic. The transition of Claude models from Bedrock to Vertex is visualized as a 'level up' or map travel, making technical backend changes feel like an exciting game update. The new app is introduced as a 'new challenger' or NPC.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A retro game menu appearing over a blurred background of a pixelated digital garden. Large pixel text reads 'UPDATE LOG'. A shiny notification icon in Lime Green (#ecf874). Warm lighting, soft pastel gradients (lavender to mint). 8-bit aesthetic, nostalgic and welcoming.
images.description: Intro slide setting the retro gaming theme.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a new NPC character entering a cozy village square. The character represents 'ChatPUA' (roleplay app). Above them is a speech bubble with a drama mask icon üé≠. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass, pastel sky. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'New App: ChatPUA'. Nostalgic, cute.
images.description: Announcing the new ChatPUA app as a new character arrival.

images.prompt: Pixel art illustration of a cute robot (Claude) jumping from a gray rocky platform to a glowing futuristic cloud castle. Represents switching from Bedrock to Vertex AI. Soft pastel gradients, magical lime green (#ecf874) sparkles. 8-bit aesthetic, cozy vibes like Celeste. Text: 'Claude Leveled Up!'.
images.description: Visualizing the Claude model migration to Vertex AI as a platforming level-up.

alt_text: A series of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A retro game update screen with lime green accents. 2. A pixel art character representing a new app in a village. 3. A cute robot jumping between platforms representing a server upgrade.
